name: Car Couple Racing
description:
So you think you can drive! Huh!

Lets see if you can drive two cars simultaneously. Gamebread studios now presents Car Couple Racing where you ll be driving two cars at the same time. Mission is to avoid crashes with falling particles but you need some point though. Collect ballz that are falling but avoid particles collision.

HOW TO PLAY

- Touch on either side to move cars
- Avoid Hurdles
- Collect Ballz
- Game center

Product of Gamebread "Live to Play"
